<h1 align="center">
  Basic Gatsby Blog
</h1>

## Technologies used 🛠️
**Deployment**: *Netlify* <br />
**Design**: *styled components* <br />
**Framework**: *Gatsby* <br />
    

## Usage 📋
```bash
#1. clone this project
~ git clone https://github.com/oussamabouchikhi/gatsby-blog.git
#2. cd into it
~ cd gatsby-blog
#3. install dependencies
~ npm i
#4. run app 
~ npm run develop
```

Pull request are welcome feel free to `fork` this repo
